title: Disney+ and Hulu now available with Google Play Points
description: Google Play Points members can get both Disney+ and Hulu.
author: Mekka OkerekeGeneral Manager, Apps on Google Play
excerpt: Google Play Points members can get both Disney+ and Hulu.
text: Oct 24, 2024 [[read-time]] min read Gold, Platinum, and Diamond members can now get Disney+ and Hulu. Earlier this year, we leveled up Google Play Points to connect members with rewards and experiences they'll love. Since then, our members have unlocked exclusive perks and VIP experiences at some of the hottest events this summer, like Comic-Con and Zedd In The Park. Now we’re collaborating with top streaming services to bring members even more perks! Starting today, Gold+ Play Points members can get subscriptions to both Disney+ and Hulu.1 These offers will be available to new subscribers on Google Play. Disney+ is the streaming home of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars and National Geographic, with thousands of award-winning classics and originals. Eligible Play Points members in the United States, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom, Japan, and Taiwan can claim Disney+ on us,2 and watch new releases like Disney and Pixar’s “Inside Out 2” and Marvel Television’s “Agatha All Along.” And that’s not all! Eligible Play Points members in the United States can also claim up to a year of Hulu (With Ads). Discover hit TV series and films, along with award-winning Hulu Originals – from dramas like FX’s “Shōgun” to animated favorites like “Futurama” and reality hits like “The Kardashians,” your next entertainment is just a click away. Here are the rewards available to Play Points members in the U.S., though the offer differs by country, so check the Perks tab of Play Points home to see what’s available for you:Gold members get six months of Disney+ Basic (With Ads) and/or six months of Hulu (With Ads)Platinum members get nine months of Disney+ Basic (With Ads) and/or nine months of Hulu (With Ads)Diamond members get a full year of Disney+ Basic (With Ads) and/or a full year of Hulu (With Ads) Disney+ is available now, and Hulu is rolling out today to eligible members. Be sure to redeem these rewards soon, because they won’t last long.
html:
Oct 24, 2024

[[read-time]] min read

Gold, Platinum, and Diamond members can now get Disney+ and Hulu.

Earlier this year, we leveled up Google Play Points to connect members with rewards and experiences they'll love. Since then, our members have unlocked exclusive perks and VIP experiences at some of the hottest events this summer, like Comic-Con and Zedd In The Park.

Now we’re collaborating with top streaming services to bring members even more perks! Starting today, Gold+ Play Points members can get subscriptions to both Disney+ and Hulu.1 These offers will be available to new subscribers on Google Play.

Disney+ is the streaming home of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars and National Geographic, with thousands of award-winning classics and originals. Eligible Play Points members in the United States, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom, Japan, and Taiwan can claim Disney+ on us,2 and watch new releases like Disney and Pixar’s “Inside Out 2” and Marvel Television’s “Agatha All Along.”

And that’s not all! Eligible Play Points members in the United States can also claim up to a year of Hulu (With Ads). Discover hit TV series and films, along with award-winning Hulu Originals – from dramas like FX’s “Shōgun” to animated favorites like “Futurama” and reality hits like “The Kardashians,” your next entertainment is just a click away.

Here are the rewards available to Play Points members in the U.S., though the offer differs by country, so check the Perks tab of Play Points home to see what’s available for you:

  • Gold members get six months of Disney+ Basic (With Ads) and/or six months of Hulu (With Ads)
  • Platinum members get nine months of Disney+ Basic (With Ads) and/or nine months of Hulu (With Ads)
  • Diamond members get a full year of Disney+ Basic (With Ads) and/or a full year of Hulu (With Ads)

Disney+ is available now, and Hulu is rolling out today to eligible members. Be sure to redeem these rewards soon, because they won’t last long.
